name: The Rising of Mahou Shoujo Machinegun
name_original: The Rising of Mahou Shoujo Machinegun
description:
Game made for MAGIC GIRL GAME JAM 2.

platform run and gun 

controls:

left and right arrows, or "A" and "D" button to move

"S" or down arrow to crouch

"Space" to jump

"C " or "left mouse" button to shoot 

"Z" or "Q" to transform

WHEN IN TRAMSFORMED STATE PRESS AND HOLD FIRE BUTTON.
